channel.title: The Runekeeper/Runecaster (Vers 2)
channel.description:
Yeah another phone suggestion. But this class will probably suck early game. Late game. Better.
--------
The Runekeeper - Blue Dragon Offensive (Support?)
Rune Of Determination (Passive) - Immune to occupation, redirection abilities.
Rune Of Protection (Day Ability) - Immune to death tonight (2 uses)
Rune of Stunning (Day Ability) - Prevent any further abilities used by target today (unlimited uses)
Rune Of Strength (Night Ability) - Prevent visits to a target. They must be a certain class type.
Rune Of Power (Night Ability) - Prevent Two class types instead of one. (2 uses)
-------
The Runecaster - Unseen Offensive.
*Keeps the Rune of Determination*
Rune Of Paralysis (Day Ability) If you suspect the prince will attempt to jail a unseen member. Disable their jailing ability. (1 use)
*Keeps Rune of Stunning*
Rune Of Instinct (Night Ability) Prevent all players of the same princess flirt result. You will learn if they are K/O, S/S, S/I. You can not target fellow unseen members.
-------
Ok I tried to balance this out... I think unseen is OP a bit This class is non-unique, Convertible. This class is Immune to death, Occupation, Redirection
